title: The Glow of Fallen Stars
description: I longed so hard for all the things that make life life, and I never thought they'd be mine. But now ... now they are. Now I have something to lose.Seren and Dom have fled their old lives on board spaceship Ventura in order to be together. They crash-land on a beautiful, uninhabited planet, which at first seems like paradise.There is no one to answer to ... but no one to ask for help. And with each new day comes the realisation of how vulnerable they truly are.This planet has secrets - lots of them. Uncovering them could be the key to survival, but at what cost?
author: Kate Ling
